content.query:
create DATABASE JustForTesting

create VIEW testServerless
as
SELECT
    count(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kjastorage.dfs.core.windows.net/test/partitiontest/ORDERS/*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) in ('O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-01','O_ORDERDATE=1992-01-02')
